title: Mark Levin Audio Rewind - 6/16/20
description:
On Tuesday's Mark Levin Show, Eric Hoffer's book the "True Believer" describes mass movements. Some in these movements, like Hollywood millionaires and Hollywood, aren't giving voice to the struggle, they're simply protecting their status and profit. Some are invested in the protest and some are invested in their own enterprise and pretend to be down with the revolution. Then, Ben Domenech, co-founder of the Federalist website, joins the show to discuss how NBC News tried to get Google to demonetize his website. Later, a treat from the late great Paul Harvey reveals a view of the police rarely seen in today's media. It’s sickening to see how cops are being treated lately. Afterward, Sean Hannity calls in to discuss his new book "Live Free or Die," which is out in August. https://www.amazon.com/Live-Free-Die-America-World/dp/1982149973/ref=sr_1_1_sspa?dchild=1&keywords=sean+hannity&qid=1592353035&sr=8-1-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUExNktXTlg2SVkzWE9YJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwNzgzMDA4SE9USDBENlkwSTBOJmVuY3J5cHRlZEFkSWQ9QTA4Njg1NzMxRFVCODQwU1kyVVA4JndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ%3D%3D&fbclid=IwAR1Cf5K1Wcy9M944MIxFGJhQY1ixnhh-F8j4S9d3BV3j3Icy3CSPFNyzPjY
Hannity stresses the importance of the coming election and why liberty literally depends on it. There's too much at stake in this election to take it lightly.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

content:encoded:
On Tuesday's Mark Levin Show, Eric Hoffer's book the "True Believer" describes mass movements. Some in these movements, like Hollywood millionaires and Hollywood, aren't giving voice to the struggle, they're simply protecting their status and profit. Some are invested in the protest and some are invested in their own enterprise and pretend to be down with the revolution. Then, Ben Domenech, co-founder of the Federalist website, joins the show to discuss how NBC News tried to get Google to demonetize his website. Later, a treat from the late great Paul Harvey reveals a view of the police rarely seen in today's media. It’s sickening to see how cops are being treated lately. Afterward, Sean Hannity calls in to discuss his new book "Live Free or Die," which is out in August. https://www.amazon.com/Live-Free-Die-America-World/dp/1982149973/ref=sr_1_1_sspa?dchild=1&keywords=sean+hannity&qid=1592353035&sr=8-1-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUExNktXTlg2SVkzWE9YJmVuY3J5cHRlZElkPUEwNzgzMDA4SE9USDBENlkwSTBOJmVuY3J5cHRlZEFkSWQ9QTA4Njg1NzMxRFVCODQwU1kyVVA4JndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ%3D%3D&fbclid=IwAR1Cf5K1Wcy9M944MIxFGJhQY1ixnhh-F8j4S9d3BV3j3Icy3CSPFNyzPjY

Hannity stresses the importance of the coming election and why liberty literally depends on it. There's too much at stake in this election to take it lightly.
